public.about.meta-description: Learn more about Parallel's mission and our story
public.about.mission: Our mission is to make professionals work worthwhile
public.about.story-1: When we were in our previous jobs, we realized that in almost all the topics we were carrying, it was usual to ask for information, it being usual for customers to take a long time to send the information we needed to work.
public.about.story-2: That information we requested was essential to start working.
public.about.story-3: When asking other professionals, many agreed that this same situation often happened to them. It did not matter if at the time of requesting the information we left it beautiful and easily understood, customers rarely responded to the email with all the information.
public.about.story-4: It was common for customers to send the information with an eyedropper or forget to send certain documents. This forced us to constantly chase customers so that we could have all the information.
public.about.story-5: We began to investigate what tools in the market could solve that situation and not seeing any tool that solved it well and in a simple way we decided to solve it ourselves.
public.about.story-6: At that time Parallel was born.
public.about.tech-company: Parallel is a technology company that builds the next generation tools for professionals daily tasks.
public.about.title: About
public.book-demo.basic-functions: Basic functions of our platform: petitions, contacts and document management.
public.book-demo.checklist: How to send a checklist: to several recipients, types of information fields.
public.book-demo.contact-soon: Someone from our team will contact you as soon as possible.
public.book-demo.follow: Follow the status of your requests: progress, delivery and read receipts.
public.book-demo.review-and-download: Reviewing and downloading received information: review completed checklists and download documents.
public.book-demo.title: Book a demo
public.book-demo.what-we-explain: In this demo we will explain:

public.careers.meta-description: Join our team at Parallel on our mission to give professionals their time back
public.careers.practice: Are you looking for a place to put into practice the knowledge you have acquired or learn even more?
public.careers.title: Careers
public.careers.we-want: We want to make life easier for our users so they have more time for the important things.
public.case.laura.centralized-informatio: All the information always available in a single place on the cloud.
public.case.laura.client-anywhere: The convenience for her clients, who now can upload their files at any time and from any device.
public.case.laura.increased-billing: In just one month, Laura has managed to increase her billable hours and an additional net income of â‚¬ 1,500 per month.
public.case.laura.non-billable: All these tasks add up to more than 20 hours a month that Laura cannot bill to her clients.
public.case.laura.recently-discovered: Laura has recently discovered Parallel and is regaining almost an hour a day.
public.case.laura.register: If you want to start using Parallel for free, register here.
public.case.laura.reminders: The peace of mind about not having to chase clients, because Parallel does it for her.
public.case.laura.time-spent: Laura spends more than an hour everyday requesting information and reviewing emails to make sure she has all the documents she needs to start her work.
public.claim.focus: Let control give you peace of mind
public.claim.follow-up: Parallel makes it simple to follow up on the status and the conversations around the transactions for you and your recipients.
public.claim.forget-emails: Forget about unorganized emails. Parallel helps you find, review and work with the relevant documents quickly.
public.claim.multiple-recipients: With control, you can decide and start working when you know you can or need to. Let focus help you stay productive.
public.claim.speed: Know the status, speed up transactions

public.home.hero-claim: Free your time and your mind
public.home.hero-control: Sending a Parallel gives you control over the progress of the documents and the information you need.
public.home.hero-discover-use: You can use Parallel if you work in a law firm, accounting firm or startup.
public.home.hero-discover-use-2: Discover everything you can do with our platform.
public.home.hero-process: Turn your document collection into a professional and scalable process.
public.home.hero-subtitle: Parallel collects and organizes the information you need on time so that you can keep focus and stay productive.
public.home.hero-try-now: Try our secure and fast solution to manage documents.
public.home.title: Collect information efficiently
public.how-it-works-hero.client-timings: We automate the information request process. Your client will not know that it is not you who sends the emails.
public.how-it-works-hero.description-1: In 3 easy steps you can create a request with the documentation you need your client to send you.
public.how-it-works-hero.description-2: Our platform is secure, so you can focus on what's important until we notify you that your client has already sent everything.
public.how-it-works-hero.focus-on-work: We will send reminders to your client so you don't have to worry about a thing. When everything is ready, you will receive a notification.

public.meta-description: Parallel helps professionals collect and organize the information from their clients with its email and checklists automation platform and form-like client portal.

public.people.routine-change: Let us tell you how her routine has changed since she discovered Parallel.

public.popular.collect-schedules: Collect all the schedules without space limitation and access them in a single place
public.popular.easily-collect: Easily collect all the information from potential clients before starting to work
public.popular.focus-on-contract: Focus on the contract while your clients send you the addenda at their pace
public.popular.information-ready: Have your information ready every month in your space and reduce the emails received in your inbox
public.popular.multiple-recipients: Send a single request to multiple parties to gather the information and keep everything organized
public.popular.periodical-requests: Set up periodical requests that automatically collects the information for you
public.privacy.title: Privacy policy
public.security.data-at-rest: Your data at rest is encrypted using the 256-bit AES-256 (Advanced Encryption Standard).
public.security.hero-title: Your information is safe with Parallel
public.security.how-we-protect: How do we protect your data and information?
public.security.meta-description: Learn more about security at Parallel
public.security.pass-storage: We will never store your passwords as you type them, you can only reset them by means that allow us to verify your credentials.
public.security.pillar: At Parallel we maintain security as one of our fundamental pillars. We know that trust is the foundation of any relationship. For this reason, we protect you and the people with whom you interact.
public.security.protect-your-customer: How do we protect your clients' information?
public.security.secure-access: You can safely access your files from any computer, and all communications and requests for information will be kept safe from third parties.
public.security.ssl-connection: We use SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) to protect data in transit between the Parallel application in your browser and our servers.
public.security.system-security-layers: To achieve this, our system has multiple layers of protection and is secure by design.
public.security.title: Security
public.security.trust-our-security: Trust Parallel to keep all your information safe and confidential.
public.security.verify-identity: In addition, no one will be able to access upload pages to download or view information without first identifying themselves.
public.security.your-connection: How do we protect your connection?

public.services.collaboration.avoid-repe: Avoid requesting the same information more than once.
public.services.collaboration.centralize: Centralize conversations in a single place.
public.services.collaboration.no-install: Always accessible, no downloads or installs needed.
public.services.collaboration.see-review: Track what documents have already been reviewed.

tour.contact-details.essential: All the essential information of your contact will be displayed here: email, first name, and last name.
tour.contact-details.info: You can find all the information regarding a contact stored in Parallel on this page.
tour.contact-details.name: Parallel will use the first name shown here for any messages you send to your contact. Make sure it is correct.
tour.contact-details.petitions-list: Here is a list of all the petitions you sent to your contact to help you find them faster.
tour.contacts.add-contact: Here you can create a contact before sending any petition to her.
tour.contacts.list: Here you can find a list with every contact that you have sent a petition to or that you have created from this page.
tour.petition-activity.items: Here you can view and manage your petitions' access, messages, follow-ups, and event history.
tour.petition-activity.open: Are you wondering if your recipients read the emails or opened the recipient replies page?
tour.petition-activity.overview: Have a better overview of what is happening around your petition with the activity timeline.
tour.petition-activity.send-message: Send an automatic or custom reminder message to your recipients.
tour.petition-activity.you-can: In this section, you will be able to:
tour.petition-compose.add-petition-field: Here you can add the recipients, your first message, and configure your automatic reminders.
tour.petition-compose.create-petition: Let's fill out your first petition
tour.petition-compose.field-types: Here you can add what you need from your recipients and choose the type of information it is (files or written replies).
tour.petition-compose.petition-advanced-: Choose here the language from the upload page and the automatic messages that we will send to your recipients, and the deadline you want us to inform them.
tour.petition-compose.petition-reminders: We know that every situation and every client is different, so please help us understand better when it is best to send the reminders.
We will handle this, but tell us a little bit more.
tour.petition-compose.select-multiple-re: If you select multiple recipients, any of them will be able to reply to any of the items you requested.
tour.petition-compose.set-petition: On this page, you can set up the information that you need from your recipients.
tour.petition-compose.show-around: Let us show you step by step!
tour.petition-replies.all-items-on-page: On this page, you can see all the items that you requested to the recipients.
tour.petition-replies.completed-items: Keep track of the documents and replies you review by using the approve and reject buttons.
tour.petition-replies.control: Here you can control and verify the information that your recipients have submitted.
tour.petition-replies.conversations.keep: Avoid back and forth emails, and keep track of the conversations around documents or information here.
tour.petition-replies.conversations.send: Take your time to include your comments and send them when they are ready.
tour.petition-replies.conversations.uncl: Is there anything not clear? Is the submitted document incorrect?
tour.petition-replies.download: If the information is correct and you need them, you can download the files, or copy the text responses.
tour.petition-replies.download.save-time: Save time downloading and renaming all the files from here.
tour.petition-replies.download.variables: Try using variables to set how you want your filenames to appear.
tour.petition-replies.your-information: Here you have your information on the requests
tour.petitions-list.create-petition: Let's start by creating a petition!
tour.petitions-list.show-around: If this is your first time here, let us show you around!
tour.petitions-list.we-collect: We are here to help you collect and organize the documents and information you need, keeping everything under control.
tour.petitions-list.we-notify: We will let you know when the recipients complete everything.
tour.petitions-list.you-focus: We want you to focus on what matters, so let us collect the information for you.
